list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Tracking down a bug where signals are not drawn to the interface. Instead new windows are created. Some evidence that this is an interaction between default use of matplotlib and PySide 6.
I removed or commented out alternative plotting functionailty through the code base. However that did not fixe the issue.

task.summary: Mostly working app with functionality in main window features. Menus are not implemented. Annotation and EDF classes are well developed. Fell a sleep on the keyboard and introduce a bug on multuple EDF load. 90% move of hypnogram drawing from viewer to annotation class. Need step function identification for spectrogram list. Neither y axis of x axis implemented in signals.
Hypnogram labels working again after inverting hypnogram axis. Created a function to return sleep stage mapping.
Hypnogram redraws after combo box selection. Deleted hypnogram plotting function within the interface. Will use the plotting funciton within AnnotationXmlClass - Sleep Stages
Created function if EDF Signals to identify stepped and continuous functions from the sampling rate. can identify eeg, stepped, and continuous signals.

Tracking down a bug where signals are not drawn to the interface. Instead new windows are created. Some evidence that this is an interaction between default use of matplotlib and PySide 6.
I removed or commented out alternative plotting functionailty through the code base. However that did not fixe the issue.

MESSAGE.value: Mostly working app with functionality in main window features. Menus are not implemented. Annotation and EDF classes are well developed. Fell a sleep on the keyboard and introduce a bug on multuple EDF load. 90% move of hypnogram drawing from viewer to annotation class. Need step function identification for spectrogram list. Neither y axis of x axis implemented in signals.
Hypnogram labels working again after inverting hypnogram axis. Created a function to return sleep stage mapping.
Hypnogram redraws after combo box selection. Deleted hypnogram plotting function within the interface. Will use the plotting funciton within AnnotationXmlClass - Sleep Stages
Created function if EDF Signals to identify stepped and continuous functions from the sampling rate. can identify eeg, stepped, and continuous signals.

Tracking down a bug where signals are not drawn to the interface. Instead new windows are created. Some evidence that this is an interaction between default use of matplotlib and PySide 6.
I removed or commented out alternative plotting functionailty through the code base. However that did not fixe the issue.
